Speed
========
In summary:

+----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+---------------------+
|   Function     | **sw-OSX / np** | **sw-OSX / ml** | **sw-i0S / np** | **sw-iOS / ml** | **sw-iOS / sw-OSX** |
+----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+---------------------+
| `pe1`          | 1.39            | 1.66            | 6.21            | 7.43            | 4.46                |
+----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+---------------------+
| `pe10`         | 0.29            | 1.23            | 1.55            | 6.16            | 5.01                |
+----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+---------------------+
| `pi_approx`    | 2.15            | 9.90            | 8.79            | 36.7            | 3.71                |
+----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+---------------------+
| `soft_thresh`  | 0.019           | 0.071           | 0.22            | 0.74            | 10.53               |
+----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+---------------------+

.. note:: To condense this table I use ``np`` for NumPy, ``ml`` for Matlab and ``sw`` for swix.

.. note:: All tests were run under Xcode beta 6

.. note:: OSX tests were run on my machine, a 2012 macbook air with an SSD and 8GB RAM and iOS tests were run on my iPhone 5.

All functions are `on Github <https://github.com/scottsievert/swix/blob/master/swix/speed/>`_ for your browsing.


Times
-----------------
Time in seconds on my Macbook Air:

+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| Function       | -Onone | -O     | -Ounchecked |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| pe1            | 1.96   | 0.239  | 0.236       |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| pe10           | 3.04   | 0.662  | 0.632       |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| pi_approx      | 0.63   | 0.109  | 0.111       |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| soft_threshold | 0.016  | 0.0017 | 0.0018      |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+

Time in seconds on my iPhone 5:

+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| Function       | -Onone | -O     | -Ounchecked |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| pe1            | 74.08  | 1.072  | 1.055       |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| pe10           | 110.91 | 3.190  | 3.165       |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| pi_approx      | 28.04  | 0.422  | 0.404       |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+
| soft_threshold | 0.720  | 0.0197 | 0.0179      |
+----------------+--------+--------+-------------+

And we should also compare against NumPy/Matlab!

+----------------+-------+--------+----------+----------+
| Function       | NumPy | Matlab | swix-OSX | swix-iOS |
+----------------+-------+--------+----------+----------+
| pe1            | 0.170 | 0.142  | 0.236    | 1.050    |
+----------------+-------+--------+----------+----------+
| pe10           | 2.04  | 0.514  | 0.632    | 3.165    |
+----------------+-------+--------+----------+----------+
| pi_approx      | 0.046 | 0.011  | 0.109    | 0.404    |
+----------------+-------+--------+----------+----------+
| soft_threshold | 0.081 | 0.024  | 0.0017   | 0.0179   |
+----------------+-------+--------+----------+----------+
